## SubmitActionPayload.fail() method

**Signature:**


|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  message | T | 提示信息 |
|  duration | number | _(Optional)_ 持续时间（毫秒），默认 1500 |
